text: Hey all, I'm very new to HubSpot CMS coming from a Wordpress background. Eager to dive in and learn. Cheers :grinning:
Hello! I am new to HubSpot, but we have used Marketo prior. Excited to be a part of the community and learning from all of you awesome people! :relaxed:
welcome aboard! i just took our current org through a migration from marketo to HubSpot a few months ago. things are... nicer over here.
